channel.title: Beginning Monorail Loading Error
channel.description:
So I start a new game and during the monorail sequence, as soon as I go through the second tunnel, it starts loading and after a few seconds I am stuck on this screen : [img]https://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/558701386999723873/9AC4FADE7B06A33C91BC070B9AAE1FEBAE06449A/[/img] [img]https://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/558701386999720613/A143147F26DC57C8472EAB95F28BE12F32D6E9AA/[/img]
These two images are separate loadings. It cannot move or look around, it's just stuck on this screen.
